active_incidents.title: Some users are unable to access channels through channel name links

notes.body:
Some users on the desktop app may experience issues accessing channels from threads or posts by clicking on the channel name link. This happens to users who've done a hard refresh in the app after around 12:53 PM PST. We recommend users to avoid doing a hard refresh in the meantime.

As a workaround, users can access the channel from the sidebar, channel browser or quick switcher. 

Our team is actively working on a fix. Thank you for your patience while we solve the issue.
